sub_title: Senior manager, AVAILABLE at short notice for project-management in NL and other countries, crisis & interim-management
summary:
Long-term experience in Interim Management, Management Consultancy and Project Management in NL, RUS and RO. 

Available at short notice for new Project Management or Interim Management assignments! Please contact me at +31 6 53 275 949.

General management I Crisis management I Change management I Project management I Infrastructure I Water sector I Energy sector 

Co-Initiator of the Enduro Management formula: ENvironmental services by a DUtch-ROmanian team of specialists. This resulted in the erection of Enduro Management Romania S.R.L. in Bucharest. See the company website.

Pending project:
Den Haag Nieuw Centraal: Project Manager on behalf of 7 utility suppliers (drinking-water, electricity (LV and MV), gaz, city-heating, telecom/data, cable TV/data) during the reconstruction of the entire Central Station area in Den Haag in the period 2004 - 2015

Recently closed projects:
1. Randstad 380 (TenneT project): Project Manager Execution on behalf of nkt cables GmbH in KÃ¶ln (D) regarding the construction of the undergrond HV (380 kV) connection of around 11 km in the Delft region, the largest underground HV cable project in the entire world!
2. Pilotproject intake-management system for the Prut and Moldova rivers in Iasi, Romania: Project Manager on behalf of Dunea (NL water-company in the Den Haag region) for the by the Partners for Water program financed project. Here an Early Warning System was constructed and implemented.

Specialties:
Underground infra-stucture in urban and agricultural environment
Water Supply and Waste Water Treatment
Repair, Maintenance and Damage-repair at light and heavy vehicles (including Busses & Coaches)

Something else:
Enduro Management Romania acquired so far ca. 34 ha agricultural land around Gaesti, judet Dambovita, Romania, around 70 km North-West of Bucuresti. Most land-lots have been re-cultivated already and in use for growing agricultural products. In Crangurile, Dambovita, 10 ha of protected forest has been acquired.
